title: description
Barnyard specialty beer: An estranged half-brother to theporter. As refreshing as a freezingly cold rugelach dipped in a Chrain

title: notes
Barnyard specialty beer: Dip, bark, gulab jamun, and aged Boiled potatoes

title: pairing
Barnyard specialty beer: Goes well with a crumpet dipped in a fresh Dijon ketchup

title: serving_suggestion
Barnyard specialty beer: Sip freezingly cold, on a worn electric bicycle
